channel.title: HVAC on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in HVAC on PlaceOS

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society maintaining sustainable standards for the built environment. They are the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: Canada Needs to Retrofit 482,000 Buildings by 2050—At the Current Pace, It Will Take 70 Years
item.description: Canada must retrofit nearly half a million commercial buildings to meet its 2050 net-zero target, yet the current pace it will take them 70 years to reach it.

item.title: A Guide to Energy Data Collection & Utilization
item.description: How to collect energy data in commercial buildings so that you can find out where you’re wasting energy like powering empty spaces.

item.title: Webinar: Campus Management Systems with Cisco Meraki
item.description: Learn how campus management systems leverage occupancy data like Cisco Meraki so that you’re not powering empty classrooms on campus.

item.title: Importance of Energy Data for Commercial Buildings
item.description: Understand the importance of energy data in commercial buildings. Learn how analytics drive energy reduction and enhance workplace efficiency.

item.title: Indoor Air Quality Integration: Kaiterra
item.description: Enhance indoor air quality with Kaiterra integration. Learn how to monitor and improve air quality for healthier environments. Experience the difference today!

item.title: Size Does Matter: The 2% Topping the Energy Charts
item.description: Uncover the secrets of the top 2% in commercial real estate. Achieve energy reduction and lower energy consumption with expert insights. Find out how today!

item.title: Smart Building Energy analytics
item.description: Discover how energy analytics for commercial buildings can enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Leverage data insights to optimize energy consumption today!

item.title: £93bn of Commercial Real Estate is at Risk, Here’s What To Do
item.description: Unlocking sustainability: UK’s mandate & PlaceOS’s smart energy solutions reshape real estate’s future.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Occupancy-Based Energy Automation
item.description: A live demonstration about Occupancy-Based Energy Automation, Our AI Roadmap & New Room Booking Features

item.title: The world's largest emitter
item.description: Real estate is the largest asset class on Earth. It’s also the largest emitter of greenhouse gasses.

item.title: User input equals error: the Elon Musk approach
item.description: Tesla takes the approach, all user input equals error. There’s a lot we can learn from that when we apply that ethos.
